document_data.name: Gothror the Ravager
document_data.mainbody: '''Gothror the Ravager''' was an [[undead]] [[skeleton]] [[giant]] in [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The unfortunate skeletal creature remained inside [[Tyrintar's Hall]], along with countless other undead. It was encountered when [[Uhlsdrin Nirveth]] came looking for the [[Icon of the Dwarves]] in [[1374 DR]].
